Name: Kitty Adventure
About the game: Kitty Adventure is a classic platformer overlooking the side. The kitten lost his family, help him find her. You are waiting for 3 colorful locations with different types of enemies on them. The game is not as simple as it may seem at first glance. To easily pass the levels, you need to think strategically and not to waste consumables just like that. By the way, there is a merchant in the game who can buy shells and fish restoring health. Gold falls out of the defeated enemies, which is another reason for eliminating them. The game also contains small elements of the quest. Peculiarities -The color graphics - Gamepad support -Wellic types of enemies -Best elements
